import { Box, Flex, Text, Link as A } from 'rebass' import { Styled, useColorMode } from 'theme-ui' import Link from 'next/link' import Icon from './icon' import Avatar from './avatar' const ColorButton = ({ mode, sx, ...props }) => ( ) export default props => { const [mode, setMode] = useColorMode() return ( <> AngelHacks Schedule Register { const next = mode === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark' setMode(next) }} /> {props.children} Site by @lachlanjc Fiscally sponsored by The Hack Foundation.
Nonprofit EIN: 81-2908499. ) }
